name: UFO Woods: Tower Defense
description:
UFO Woods : Tower Defense  (Still in development)

A simple tower defense game 

- Featuring a genetic algorithm for a procedural map generation based on Sunny Valley Studio tutorial (https://www.youtube.com/c/SunnyValleyStudio/videos)

Currently not playable but you can try the already implemented  procedural map generation.

Controls

Mouse


Assets used in this project : 

https://wenrexa.itch.io/holoui

https://kenney.itch.io/kenney-game-assets-1
